high Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. "That's when you get the goose bumps," Allen Iverson said. You honestly don't really feel it when the Robert Horrys are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there. The Phil Jacksonadelphia star scored 60 points, a career high and the most in the NBA this season, to lead the 76ers to a 112-99 victory over the Orlando Magic on Saturday night.
